item.title: Full WWE 2K25 Roster Revealed
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/full-wwe-2k25-roster-revealed/

2K Sports has revealed the full launch roster for WWE 2K25. WWE 2K25 will release with over 300 playable wrestlers this year—including variants—giving fans no shortage of options for their matches.

As part of IGN Fan Fest, the base roster for WWE 2K25 has been revealed. The list below includes all of the playable superstars at launch minus some variants and some unlocks behind modes.

Check out the roster below, broken down by (last known) brand: RAW, Smackdown, NXT, Legends, Managers. And let us know what you think of this year’s launch roster and who you’d like to see added as DLC down below or in the official Insider Gaming Forums.

WWE 2K25 launches on March 14 for Xbox Series, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, and PC.

Liquid Swords The Next Studio To Hold Layoffs

Liquid Swords, the studio started by Avalanche Studios co-founder Christofer Sundberg has announced a round of layoffs.

Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 Has Sold 2 Million Units in 2 Weeks

Warhorse Studios has announced that Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 has sold two million units in its first two weeks.

Days Gone Remastered Upgrade Not Applicable for PS Plus Owners

Players who own the game on PlayStation Plus are not eligible for the Days Gone Remastered $10 upgrade. Here are more details.

Hunter X Hunter Nen X Impact Release Date Revealed 

Hunter x Hunter Nen x Impact releases on July 17, 2025; here are more details on the game editions and Season 1 DLC pass.

item.title: Elden Ring Nightreign Release Date—Platforms, Editions, and Price
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/elden-ring-nightreign-release-date/

FromSoftware’s newest project is an interesting tie-in with Bandai Namco. Let’s find out everything we know about Elden Ring Nightreign, its release date, price tag, and much more.

Elden Ring Nightreign gets more surprising by the second. The Game Awards 2024 took everyone by surprise with the announcement of Nightreign. It was even more shocking to realize it’s a collaboration between FromSoftware and giants Bandai Namco! But we’ve learned from the Nightreign Network Test the new Souls title is a fascinating battle royale and roguelike hybrid.

It’s not a full-scale release, but it has enough content to keep you busy for a few months. That said, let’s dig through the dirt.

When is Elden Ring Nightreign Coming Out?

Elden Ring Nightreign is gearing up for a May 30 release date worldwide.

Early indications suggest Early Access isn’t happening for Elden Ring Nightreign. None of its editions or pre-order incentives include mention of playing Nightreign early. This makes May 30 a global launch for FromSoftware and Bandai Namco’s joint title.

Let the wait for Elden Ring Nightreign’s release date commence—Tarnished.

Elden Ring Nightreign Release Date Platforms

Old-gen users will be pleased to learn Elden Ring Nightreign is debuting on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

2022’s Elden Ring also launched on the mentioned formats. However, it’s three years later, and many developers and publishers now opt to skip the PS4 and Xbox One. It’s not the case here, so if you’ve been able to play Elden Ring before, you’ll be able to endure the nightly grid of Elden Ring Nightreign without a fuss.

Additionally, I would be remiss to mention the Nintendo Switch misses out. It’s not much of a shock, but there’s no mention of Nightreign coming to Nintendo Switch. We’ll keep our Two Fingers crossed for a future port to the Switch 2.

Elden Ring Nightreign Release Date Editions & Price

Elden Ring Nightreign Standard Edition, Deluxe Edition, Seeker’s Edition, and Collector’s Edition are releasing to give fans a tough decision over which one to buy. They clock in at $39.99/£34.99, $54.99/£47.99, $59.99/£49.99, and $199.99/£179.99.

There’s no typo here: Four editions are available for Elden Ring Nightreign. Each caters to the level of satisfaction you want from your Nightreign experience.

Check out every edition below and its price for a quick table to consult.

I’m looking forward to Nightreign as a Souls fan. I’m obviously never getting a Bloodborne remake, so a new Elden Ring spin-off should suffice. Should this be the end of Elden RIng after this, freeing up FromSftware a new title?

Find out the latest breaking Elden Ring Nightreign news such as a potential change allowing you to fight with only two players.

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.

item.title: Is Split Fiction Cross-Platform? Crossplay Status Explained
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/is-split-fiction-cross-platform-crossplay-status-explained/

Split Fiction encourages co-op, and adding cross-platform play would facilitate this wonderfully. Hazelight Studios has a sterling reputation for letting you play its games with friends, and crossplay would make exploring Split Fiction’s vibrant and volatile world a pal-friendly pleasure.

Gaming’s interconnectivity has changed for the better in the last few years. It’s gotten to the point where more games have crossplay and cross-platform integration than those that don’t. Split Fiction‘s co-op-centric ideology encourages players to join together as the game has to be played with another player.

You can play Split Fiction together on the same console, but let’s see if crossplay is enabled.

Does Split Fiction Have Crossplay or Cross-Platform?

Split Fiction includes complete crossplay and cross-platform features—allowing you to enjoy the co-op romp with another player playing on a different format.

In layman’s terms, if you want to play Split Fiction and you have a PS5, but your friend is on Xbox Series X, crossplay allows you to join forces, despite playing on different consoles. The same goes if you’re on PC and your buddy is on PC, and so forth.

The news comes courtesy of Split Fiction’s official FAQ. Under the “Will the game be available to play online?” question, the answer succinctly states “You can play the game online with cross-play enabled.” You don’t need to worry about how you own Split Fiction or owning two copies!

Does Split Fiction Have Friend’s Pass?

Hazelight Studios brings back the Friend’s Pass scheme for Split Fiction, allowing one person to own the game and invite another player to enjoy the title for free.

Friend’s Pass is also available for the developer’s other titles: A Way Out and It Takes Two. Both are acclaimed co-op games, and Friend’s Pass ensures you can play with another player without you both needing a copy of the title.

You’d think this might affect sales, but quite the opposite. A Way Out has reportedly sold over nine million copies and counting.

A Way Out has now sold more than 9 million units! 💥 The development was a wild ride and the game was already a success back when it released. But even then, we never dared to dream of THIS many people playing our game! 😍 With that said, we will continue to look back at…

Whereas It Takes Two went one better in every way. Not only did it scoop multiple Game of the Year awards in 2021, but it’s also sold a staggering 20+ million copies!

#ItTakesTwo HAS SOLD OVER 20 MILLION!!! You’re the best fans in the world, how you have embraced our game is blowing our minds! ❤️ We’re so grateful to every one of the millions upon millions who have enjoyed their time with Cody and May 😍

Split Fiction looks to be another winner for Hazelight Studios. It has Friend’s Pass—meaning only one of you needs to own it—and looks to recapture the magic of its predecessors.

So, Split Fiction has crossplay and cross-platform compatibility and has Friend’s Pass. It’s a win-win all around, and Split Fiction should be in the GOTY conversation come the end of 2025. Or do you disagree? Offer your thoughts if you feel different.

For more on Split Fiction, check out if it’s a day one Xbox Game Pass or EA Play member, as well as its latest gameplay trailer.
